name: Aquarim
description: Aquarim is a regal and majestic Pokemon, whose shimmering crystal core is a symbol of its power. It can be found in freshwater habitats, spending its days living among the currents and freshwater plants. Its graceful movements make it look like a royal creature, and its ability to surf is evidence of its agility and skill. It is known to be a social creature and loves to explore its dynamic environment.
image_prompt: a young epic water-type squid pokemon::2.5, with a regal crystal core, in a river environment, gleaming bubble background, inked watercolor anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
